mock_exam.title: Trigonometry - Real World Scenarios (Should Use Geometric Tools)

sections.title: Section A - Word Problems with Geometric Structure

questions.question_stem: A 6 metre ladder leans against a vertical wall. The foot of the ladder is 2 metres from the base of the wall. Calculate the angle the ladder makes with the ground.
questions.question_stem_plain: A 6 metre ladder leans against a vertical wall. The foot of the ladder is 2 metres from the base of the wall. Calculate the angle the ladder makes with the ground.
questions._test_note: Ladder scenario - fundamentally a right triangle, should be MATPLOTLIB not IMAGE_GENERATION

questions.question_stem: A person 1.8m tall casts a shadow 2.4m long on horizontal ground. Calculate the angle of elevation of the sun.
questions.question_stem_plain: A person 1.8m tall casts a shadow 2.4m long on horizontal ground. Calculate the angle of elevation of the sun.
questions._test_note: Shadow problem - right triangle with angle, should be MATPLOTLIB

questions.question_stem: A cable is stretched from the top of a 15m tall building to a point on the ground 20m from the base of the building. Calculate the length of the cable.
questions.question_stem_plain: A cable is stretched from the top of a 15m tall building to a point on the ground 20m from the base of the building. Calculate the length of the cable.
questions._test_note: Cable/building - right triangle, should be MATPLOTLIB

questions.question_stem: A ramp rises 1.5m over a horizontal distance of 8m. Calculate the angle the ramp makes with the horizontal ground.
questions.question_stem_plain: A ramp rises 1.5m over a horizontal distance of 8m. Calculate the angle the ramp makes with the horizontal ground.
questions._test_note: Ramp problem - right triangle, should be MATPLOTLIB

questions.question_stem: A kite is flying at the end of a 50m string. The string makes an angle of 55 degrees with the horizontal ground. Calculate the height of the kite above the ground.
questions.question_stem_plain: A kite is flying at the end of a 50m string. The string makes an angle of 55 degrees with the horizontal ground. Calculate the height of the kite above the ground.
questions._test_note: Kite problem - right triangle with angle, should be MATPLOTLIB

questions.question_stem: A ship sails from port A on a bearing of 065 degrees for 30km to reach port B. How far east of A is port B?
questions.question_stem_plain: A ship sails from port A on a bearing of 065 degrees for 30km to reach port B. How far east of A is port B?
questions._test_note: Ship/bearing - bearing diagram with angle, should be MATPLOTLIB

questions.question_stem: From the top of a cliff 40m high, the angle of depression to a boat at sea is 25 degrees. How far is the boat from the base of the cliff?
questions.question_stem_plain: From the top of a cliff 40m high, the angle of depression to a boat at sea is 25 degrees. How far is the boat from the base of the cliff?
questions._test_note: Cliff/boat - right triangle with depression angle, should be MATPLOTLIB

questions.question_stem: To find the height of a tree, a student stands 20m from its base. The angle of elevation to the top of the tree is 35 degrees. Calculate the height of the tree.
questions.question_stem_plain: To find the height of a tree, a student stands 20m from its base. The angle of elevation to the top of the tree is 35 degrees. Calculate the height of the tree.
questions._test_note: Tree height - right triangle, should be MATPLOTLIB

expected_classifications.forbidden_reason: All these scenarios are mathematically representable as triangles/angles - IMAGE_GENERATION adds cost without educational value

_fixture_metadata.description: Real-world trigonometry word problems that should ALL be classified as MATPLOTLIB, NOT IMAGE_GENERATION
_fixture_metadata.test_purpose: Verify classifier prefers geometric representation over expensive IMAGE_GENERATION for scenarios that can be drawn as triangles
